price: 36. Ar jie sukūrė dangus ir žemę? Ne, jie neturi stipraus tikėjimo (Allahu).
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: am khalaqū al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bal lā yūqinūna
